name: AUTO_GENERATED_ADVENTURE_v2.9
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam (Theme: Delay The Inevitable)!

Come along for an Optimal Adventure! Generated by a sad AI.

- Slay Orcs and Zombies!
- Explore the Dungeon!
- Find the Treasure!
- TRY TO TURN OFF THE GAME!
- Choose between randomly generated changes!

Controls:
- WASD or Cursor Keys to move
- Mouse to Aim and Attack

Notes:
- No Audio
- Windows Executable

Credits:
- Code and design by JuhrJuhr
- Artwork by https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
